sleepInfo.healthIndicator: Health Indicator predicts illness probability using multiple biomarkers compared to your personal 28-day baseline. It weighs HRV (40%), Resting HR (25%), Respiratory Rate (20%), Sleep (10%), and Blood Oxygen (5%). Score of 0-100 where higher means healthier. Requires at least 7 days of data for reliable calculation.

This data should be interpreted with caution and is not a substitute for professional medical evaluation, diagnosis, or treatment. If you have health concerns or feel unwell, please consult with a qualified healthcare professional. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information provided by this app.
